description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
Refreshing salad made with ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, olive oil, and balsamic glaze.
Fragrant and flavorful rice dish cooked with aromatic spices, meat, and saffron, a popular dish in Pakistani cuisine.
A creamy and savory beef dish served with noodles or rice, a classic in Russian cuisine.
A fragrant and spicy curry made with green curry paste, coconut milk, vegetables, and chicken, a staple in Thai cuisine.
A classic French dish of chicken braised in red wine with mushrooms, onions, and bacon, full of rich and deep flavors.
A classic North Indian dish made with spinach (palak) and paneer (Indian cottage cheese), simmered in a creamy and flavorful tomato-based sauce.
A savory Greek pastry filled with spinach, feta cheese, onions, and herbs, layered between flaky phyllo dough sheets.
